name: Swarm of the Necromancer
description:
Entry for the Godot Wild Jam #43. Created by Cadoink and KillerX.

Play as a necromancer who wants to capture the kingdom with their swarm of skeletons. Capture peasants to convert them into skeletons and use them to defeat the enemies.

Win by destroying all of the towers.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
